    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2694</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The appearance of common objects made of Crystals of Minerals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Aussehen der geläufigen Nachrichten gebildet
von den Kristallen der Mineralien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'aspect des objets communs faits de cristaux des
minerais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A aparência dos objetos comuns feitos dos 
cristais dos minerais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'apparenza degli oggetti comuni fatti dei 
cristalli dei minerali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εμφάνιση των κοινών αντικειμένων φιαγμένων από 
κρύσταλλα των μεταλλευμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El aspecto de los objetos comunes hechos de 
cristales de minerales</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A demonstration of several well known materials made of mineral crystals.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">minerals</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Demonstration einiger weithin bekannter 
Materialien gebildet von den Mineralkristallen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une démonstration de plusieurs matériaux bien 
connus faits de cristaux minéraux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma demonstração de diversos materiais bem 
sabidos feitos de cristais minerais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una dimostrazione di parecchi materiali ben noti 
fatti dei cristalli minerali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια επίδειξη διάφορων καλά γνωστών υλικών φιαγμένη 
από ορυκτά κρύσταλλα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una demostración de varios materiales bien 
conocidos hechos de cristales mineral.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mineralien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">minerais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">minerali</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-el">μεταλλεύματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">minerales</string>
          </keyword>
